alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Molokai Leeward South; South Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 30 at 3:39PM HST until August 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...STRONG AND GUSTY WINDS THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts around 50 mph expected. Strongest wind gusts should occur on the downwind/leeward of terrain. * WHERE...Across mountain terrain and downslope into leeward sections of Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, Maui, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
